text: Woke up with mild headache. Breakfast: poha. Felt calm but a bit foggy in the morning.
Late dinner: pizza + coke. Heartburn at night and restless sleep.
Kal raat neend nahi aayi. 2am ko uth gayi. Subah chai pi. Feeling anxious and chest tight.
Lunch was dal-chawal. No bloating today. Mood steady. Focus was good.
Had salad + chickpeas. Felt energized. Later mild neck stiffness.
Stressful day. Racing thoughts. Ate nothing until 4pm then had biryani. Felt nauseous.
Worked till late. Doomscrolling. Felt guilty. Snacks: chips and chocolate.
Breakfast idli sambar. Sinus pressure and puffy face. Emotionally okay.
Skipped breakfast. Coffee only. Felt shaky and irritable. Mind scattered.
Dinner: paneer bhurji + rotis. Got sleepy after eating. Stomach bloated.
Oats with banana and walnuts. Knee soreness when walking downstairs. Not sad, just tired.
Went for a walk. Felt confident in meeting. Later sharp pain turning left in neck.
Aaj body heavy lag rahi hai. Toast butter. Feeling flat. Concentration poor.
Had quinoa bowl with roasted veggies and hummus. No cramps. Upbeat mood. Present mind.
Period day 1. Cramps strong. Low energy. Wanted chocolate.
No cramps today. Slept 8 hours. Felt clear and calm.
Tea with 2 tsp sugar. Afternoon headache behind eyes. Snappy mood.
Big workload. Rumination about work. Felt overwhelmed. Ate noodles late night.
Felt bloated after lunch (rice + dal). Mood anxious. Thoughts looping.
Good day. Walked 6k steps. Ate homemade khichdi. Mind clear.
